sameAnalysis.part_name: 这组动词均含有"给予，赠给"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: give, accord, award, confer，grant, endow, present, bestow
means: give ： 最普通用词，泛指将自己的东西给予他人，所给予的东西，物质或非物质的均可。
accord ： 侧重所给予的是应得的或是恰当的，或是因某种原因而适于接受的。
award ： 通常暗示所给予的东西是接受者应得的，而且给予者往往是具有裁判权力的。
confer ： 通常指授予称号或学位等。
grant ： 多指出于慷慨、怜悯或正义感而给予，并且通常是在被请求下给予。
endow ： 指捐赠大量的钱作基金，也可指给予非物质的东西。
present ： 指正式地给予或授予，通常伴有仪式进行。
bestow ： 正式用词，指把某物作为礼物赠送于某人，也可作引申用。

sentence.Network_en: I bestow my own attributes over liberally on him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把自己的特性慷慨地施与他了.

sentence.Network_en: He wished to bestow great honors upon the hero.
sentence.Network_cn: 他希望将那些伟大的荣誉授予这位英雄.

sentence.Network_en: He did not bestow one thought on his dead father.
sentence.Network_cn: 他想都没有想过,他过世的父亲.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 俞敏洪单词串讲 - annjining的日志 - 网易博客 ... besiege siege 包围,围攻被围攻,包围 bestow 授予,给予(奖金,遗产) bias 偏见.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... bespeak v． 显示，表示 bestow v． 给予，赐赠 betray v． 背叛，暴露.
赐字的解释---在线新华字典 ...  〖vouchsafe;bestow〗 恩赐,赏给 〖bestow;grant〗 上予下曰赐。——《正字通》.
张红岩TOEFL ... besiege vt. 围，包围 bestow v. 赠与，利用 betray vt. 背叛，泄露.

list.abs: God is impartial , the people who has destiny in hand stands forever in the balance both ends , the people who is grasped by destiny knows that God bestows destiny on him only only .上帝是公平的，掌握命运的人永远站在天平的两端，被命运掌握的人仅仅只明白上帝赐给他命运！
You remember having plenty of time to bestow all your wisdom knowledge ., 你记得你有大量的时间去传授你所有的智慧和知识.
He has long bestowed honours in exchange for donations to his good causes ., 他长期以来一直用授予荣誉头衔来换取对他的慈善事业的捐赠.
The Passionate Giver You love bestow presents , and not just on official occasions ., 激情式送礼者你喜爱馈赠礼物 , 而且不只是在正式场合.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'use for, devote to'): from be-(as an intensifier) + Old English  stōw 'place'

entry.def: To bestow something on someone means to give or present it to them.

example.ex: The Queen has bestowed a knighthood on him.
example.tran: 女王已经授予他爵士头衔。

sentences.sentence: "The university conferred a degree on its most famous former student, who never graduated"
"Her presence lends a certain cachet to the company"
"The music added a lot to the play"
"She brings a special atmosphere to our meetings"
"This adds a light note to the program"

auth_sentence.content: Bestow a little of your wholesome Advice upon our Coachmen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bestow a little of your wholesome Advice upon our Coachmen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bestow a little of your wholesome Advice upon our Coachmen.

auth_sentence.content: Besides that, you bestow to us knowledge and wisdom.
auth_sentence.res_content: Besides that, you bestow to us knowledge and wisdom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Besides that, you bestow to us knowledge and wisdom.

auth_sentence.content: Fawningly spaniel'd to bestow her hand.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fawningly spaniel'd to bestow her hand.

sentences.en: Many books were bestowed on her.

jushi.english: The President bestowed a medal on the hero.
jushi.chinese: 总统给那位英雄颁发了一枚勋章。

jushi.english: Several gifts were bestowed on the royal visitors.
jushi.chinese: 把几份礼物赠送给王室客人。

jushi.english: The queen bestowed a knighthood on him.
